abstract: The battle between Exelon and NRG heated up on Wednesday, after Exelon said that it has garnered nearly 46 percent of its fellow power company’s stock through a hostile tender offer.
lead_paragraph: The battle between Exelon and NRG heated up on Wednesday, after Exelon said that it has garnered nearly 46 percent of its fellow power company’s stock through a hostile tender offer.

headline.main: Exelon Claims 46% of NRG Shares in Hostile Tender Offer
